other_tests.findings: Significant softening and regression of skin xanthomas; marked reduction in liver volume from 6905 ml to 5178 ml over 1 year; acute 60-85% reduction in triglycerides and total cholesterol levels.
other_tests.changes_over_time: Maximum benefit achieved after approximately 40 procedures; triglyceride levels returned to preapheresis values within 7 days; visible regrowth of painful xanthomas occurred when the interval between exchanges exceeded 7 days.

other_tests.findings: Renal tubular lipidosis and early focal glomerular sclerosis.
Massive hepatomegaly and complete absence of body fat, except bone marrow fat.
other_tests.changes_over_time: Liver volume reduced from 6905 ml to 5178 ml over 1 year.
